ygData.subject: Re: Talked to Gm about that..
ygData.msgSnippet: Heh i ve heard that the green splinted platemail is only acquirable by a full group of level 50 people.  VERY hard plus rare i would suppose.  So our chances
ygData.messageBody:
Heh i've heard that the green splinted platemail is only acquirable by a
full group of level 50 people. VERY hard plus rare i would suppose. So our
chances of getting right now would not be very high :)
Allsar Olath`Vlos - Rathe
-----Original Message-----
From: kurt walther <itzkurt@...>
To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com <EQ-Clerics@onelist.com>
Date: Wednesday, June 09, 1999 11:36 PM
Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] Talked to Gm about that..


>From: kurt walther <itzkurt@...>
>
>the plate he was probably talking about is green splinted platemail..
>only setback to it is that it is VERY rare and is only wearable by human
>sized characters. but.. it does have very high AC and magical
>bonuses.. not to mention that it's EXTREMELY light. the gauntlets alone
>on it have 12 ac and like +10 str.. and that's just for the hands. one
>can only imagine what the breasplate gives. even monks can wear this
>plate.. weird huh. In my opinion, this platemail should be available
>to all sizes, not just the human sized players. kinda sucks to be a
>large or small race. EQ has done some very screwd up things. Clerics
>get stiffed a ton.
>
>------------------------------------------------------------------------
>ONElist: where real people with real interests get connected.
>http://www.onelist.com
>Join a new list today!
>
